\newcommand{\head}[1]{\textbf{\underline{#1}}}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
  & {} &&& {} && {} \\
  \head{param\ structs} && \head{members} & \head{defined\ enum\ constants} && \head{reorder\ classes} \\
  \\
  \edge{ColorSpinorParam} && \edge{fieldOrder} & \edge{QUDA\_OPENQCD\_FIELD\_ORDER} && \edge{OpenQCDDiracOrder} \\
  \\
  && \edge{dirac\_order } & \edge{QUDA\_OPENQCD\_DIRAC\_ORDER} \\
  \\
  && \edge{gauge\_order} & \edge{QUDA\_OPENQCD\_GAUGE\_ORDER} && \edge{OpenQCDOrder} \\
  \edge{QudaInvertParam} \\
  && \edge{clover\_order} & \edge{QUDA\_OPENQCD\_CLOVER\_ORDER} && \edge{OpenQCDOrder} \\
  \\
  &&&&& \head{gamma\ basis\ transformations} \\
  &&&&& \edge{NonRelToOpenqcdBasis} \\
  && \edge{gamma\_basis} & \edge{QUDA\_OPENQCD\_GAMMA\_BASIS} \\
  &&&&& \edge{OpenqcdToNonRelBasis} \\
  & {} &&& {} && {}
  \arrow[dotted, no head, from=1-2, to=16-2]
  \arrow[dotted, no head, from=1-5, to=16-5]
  \arrow[dotted, no head, from=1-7, to=16-7]
  \arrow["member"{description}, from=4-1, to=4-3]
  \arrow["{==}"{description}, draw=none, from=4-3, to=4-4]
  \arrow["instantiates"{description}, from=4-4, to=4-6]
  \arrow["{==}"{description}, draw=none, from=6-3, to=6-4]
  \arrow["instantiates"{description}, from=6-4, to=4-1]
  \arrow["{==}"{description}, draw=none, from=8-3, to=8-4]
  \arrow["instantiates"{description}, from=8-4, to=8-6]
  \arrow["member"{description}, from=9-1, to=6-3]
  \arrow["member"{description}, from=9-1, to=8-3]
  \arrow["member"{description}, from=9-1, to=10-3]
  \arrow["member"{description}, from=9-1, to=14-3]
  \arrow["{==}"{description}, draw=none, from=10-3, to=10-4]
  \arrow["instantiates"{description}, from=10-4, to=10-6]
  \arrow["{==}"{description}, draw=none, from=14-3, to=14-4]
  \arrow["instantiates"{description}, from=14-4, to=13-6]
  \arrow["instantiates"{description}, from=14-4, to=15-6]
\end{tikzcd}
